<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/maildomainsettings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Saves the mail domain settings specified in the request to the portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["domains","type"],"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["None","Custom","All"],"type":"string","description":"[None - None, Custom - Custom, All - All]","example":"None"},{"enum":[0,1,2],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - None, 1 - Custom, 2 - All]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["None","Custom","All"],"x-enum-descriptions":["None","Custom","All"]}],"description":"The type of the tenant trusted domains.","title":"TenantTrustedDomainsType"},"domains":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"The list of authorized email domains that are considered trusted.","nullable":true,"example":["some text"]},"inviteUsersAsVisitors":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies the default permission level for the invited users (visitors or not).","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for configuring trusted mail domains and visitor invitation settings.","title":"MailDomainSettingsRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
